divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were sitting outside in the front porch of our house Watching a thunderstorm roll in. We heard a low flying plane. Got up from the porch to look at the plane, as the plane was flying by we were following it. I noticed a light appear out of the clouds in front of the plane. The plane veered left,it seemed to turn away from the object. We started looking at the light trying to figure out what it was. As it passed over our house, the object didnt make any type of noise. It was moving at a slow rate of speed. My wife was able to take 3 pictures of the object before it disappeared in the clouds. I have never seen anything like it before.
trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There was one other sighting in San Antonio on or around April 29th 2013
Summary: looking at storm in sky, watching low flying plane.light appeared infront of plane.
